title: Amazon KDP Niche Research for Low Content Books | Low Content Books #5

tactics.name: Competitive Pricing Strategy
tactics.description: Set prices slightly below competitors to gain edge while maintaining profitability
steps: Check Publisher Rocket for estimated searches
Set price 1-2 cents lower than lowest competitor
caveats: Avoid pricing below cost of production
source_quotes: i would advise that your price at 5.97 because i don't see any 597 here
if you run an ad you should definitely get some clicks and hopefully some sales because your price is lower than the rest

tactics.name: Use Publisher Rocket for Niche Analysis
tactics.description: Identify low-competition niches using Publisher Rocket's BSR and review data
steps: Filter by BSR and review thresholds
caveats: When niches have high price points but low demand
source_quotes: autism planner workbook it has just 856 results and going to publish a rocket it has 1 620 amazon searches per month

tactics.name: Modify Book Covers for Niche Fit
tactics.description: Customize book covers using design tools to align with target niches
caveats: Requires design skills or access to premium templates
source_quotes: grab one from vexels if you don't know how to make a cover

heuristics.name: Low Competition Niche Targeting
heuristics.condition: If niche has high barrier to entry, then prioritize
source_quotes: any book that has a higher barrier to entry... gives you the advantage to go in for that niche

heuristics.name: Low Review Niche Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niche
source_quotes: autism planner workbook it has just 856 results

claims.statement: KDP niches with foreign language content show lower competition
source_quotes: if you publish your book into a foreign market... many people will shy away from it

claims.statement: Autism planner workbooks show high sales potential with low competition
source_quotes: 15 000 wow that is something it's really encouraging

niche_patterns.description: Niche with unique constraint creates competitive advantage
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Higher barrier to entry reduces competition while appealing to niche markets
source_quotes: if you publish your book into a foreign market... many people will shy away from it
we should have less competition there
